resources.string:
**A player may move by touching green squares only.
**A menu will pop-up when items are found in a room. Select check boxes to pick them up. 
**When a monster is nearby a notification will appear on the screen. Monsters are blind so they can detect you by moving. If you have picked up a weapon it is automatically armed. If you are not armed with a weapon you still have a chance to kill a monster if your attack power level is high enough, but it wont be easy. Monsters and Players attack on moving. You can also lose a monster by changing levels. 
**When your energy level reaches 0 you will die. If you have remaining lives you will get to start the game over to try again. Good luck!
